Windlord:

Windlord saw the conmotion down then he landed and saw his friend 
Kup pretty bad "Kup, KUP... WHAT'S UP WHAT'S GOING ON????" and 
looking to Battera said "Who're you? what's your faction? and 
whatdid happen him???"






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
wrote:
> battera::
> 
> "I can not do that. he's really in bad shape. So please, before 
his 
> spark ceases to function, he needs medical attention."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil saw that the hull had been breached and that Kup had 
> gotten
> > outside.
> > 
> > Yggdrasil: Thanks for the rescue, Trooper, but I'm afraid he'll 
have
> > to wait a few moments. Try to get him out of the way. We have a
> > dangerous Predacon spy near your position and I don't want him to
> > escape. Kup, I hope you understand this. Trooper, get ready to 
scoop
> > him up should he ever come out on your side. Try to conceal 
yourself
> > if you can.
> > 
> > The blackout didn't affect his command abilities because of his 
own
> > built-in computer systems. He was quite glad to have them now.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > Battera::
> > > 
> > > She saw he was not in good shape. She opened her comlink to a 
> general 
> > > frequency. So several bots should get the message. "I have a 
bot 
> here 
> > > who is very sick. Please come to the entrance and help him."
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > Kup had started to freez up from the gas.
> > > > Kup: I.. am.. Autobot. This.. is.. Maximal.. base...
> > > >  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:The large bat swooped 
> down 
> > > and gently set Kup down at the entrance of 
> > > > the base. She landed and transformed ito bot mode. She stood 
at 
> 12 
> > > > feet, had a bat wingspan of 30 feet and her bot mode was 
that 
> of a 
> > > > matt black finish. "My name is Battera. I am at your 
service." 
> She 
> > > > bowed to him and folded her wings around her like a 
cloak. "I 
> am a 
> > > > maximal. What faction should you belong to?"
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > Kup had to fight to speak, the gas almost taking full 
effect.
> > > > > Kup: That building below us is my base. Near the entrance 
> would 
> > > do. 
> > > > I'm Kup, what's your name, lass?
> > > > >  raccoon7679 <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:A shape, a large 
shadow 
> was 
> > > > flying high over head when she saw light 
> > > > > flashing on the ground below. She decided to fly down for 
a 
> > > closer 
> > > > > look.  She swooped down and landed in a nearby tree. She 
hung 
> > > > upside 
> > > > > down and looked at the bot who seemed to be fighting with 
> another 
> > > > > bot.  She saw the one bot run through a cloud and start to 
> > > faulter. 
> > > > > she sighed. "Well, I don't know who this bot is, but for 
my 
> > > > > programming, I must help."  She released the branch she 
was 
> > > hanging 
> > > > > by and gracefully opened up her leathery wings. She 
swooped 
> down 
> > > > and 
> > > > > grabbed the bot (KUP) by the shoulders and started to take 
to 
> the 
> > > > > sky. "Relax, your safe now. I won't hurt you. So I would 
> greatly 
> > > > > appreciate it if you wouldn't try to hurt me." She used 
her 
> huge 
> > > > > wings to gain lift and rose over the trees. "Any place you 
> want 
> > > to 
> > > > be 
> > > > > dropped off at?"
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen 
<roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > : : Kup : :
> > > > > > The Autobot drill seargent didn't have time to react. He 
> ran 
> > > into 
> > > > > the gas and out the other side of the cloud.
> > > > > > Kup continued the chase but he could feel the effects 
> start. 
> > > His 
> > > > > body was growing numb, paralizing.
> > > > > > Trying anything he could, Kup fired over Flicker, at the 
> > > ceiling 
> > > > in 
> > > > > front of him. This brings down a barrier of ruble in front 
of 
> > > > Flicker.
> > > > >
